homeHeader.title: Coordinate Logistics, Minimise Freight Overheads, & Expand Your Business Reach Dubai South Free Zone with Full 360° Support
homeHeader.description: Mitigate the risk of costly delays, activity mismatches, and insufficient warehouse space with One Nexuz. We simplify all the paperwork and documentation, so you can focus on scaling your business to new heights. Tap into Dubai South Free Zone's thriving integrated logistics hub to capitalise on the region's strategic location, lucrative tax incentives, and access to fast-growing international markets.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to secure a Dubai South Free Zone license?
items.answer: With our expert business consultants, you can secure your Dubai South FZ license within 1-7 business days.

items.question: Do I need to be physically present in Dubai to register my Dubai South business?
items.answer: No, Dubai South Free Zone offers 100% remote business setup solutions, empowering you to register and operate from any corner of the world.

items.question: What legal structures can I choose from in Dubai South FZ?
items.answer: Dubai South allows you to choose from three primary legal entities, including a Branch of a foreign or local company, Free Zone Sole Establishment, and Free Zone Limited Liability Company.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch my business in Dubai South?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need a business plan, passport copies, and a trade name to register your business, depending on your selected license.

items.question: How many visas can I get with a DMCC license?
items.answer: Yes, our specialised consultants connect you with the right bank partner to streamline personal or business bank account setup.
